Name: Jubilant
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: A well-balanced aromatic, herbal and fruity sour.
History: Adapted from a recipe attributed to "J. Perosino" in W. J. Tarling 's 1937 Café Royal Cocktail Book - Coronation Edition .
Nutrition: One serving of Jubilant contains 189 calories
